reviews.review_msg: Gillian was outstanding. She made a significant effort to incorporate cognitive tools into her teaching. Her class was enjoyable, and she effectively engaged us with the reading materials. Additionally, Gillian was excellent in time management; she always managed to cover the topics she prepared within the allotted class time.

Gillian is great! She does what she teaches! She cares for her students and their knowledge, education and engagement. She is supportive and well prepared. Loved taking her class. Learned so much and had loads of fun!
Good prof! The readings were at times very boring and dry but Gillian did her best to make them interesting

Outstanding. Best teacher I have had in my program, including undergrad. Smart and always interesting. Practices what she preaches. Always well prepared. Works really hard to make sure everyone understands the material. Just great.
Excellent prof. in every way. Clear, engaging, bright, concerned for students. Made sure we all learned the content. Varied activities. Funny. I'd take any course she was teaching.

Great prof! She knows what she's talking about, she refuses to make every class a boring lecture, and although she may not be super clear at first, she encourages you to ask questions until you have a good understanding.
